title: [Semiera's General Store]
[Semiera's Outfitting]
[Semiera's Magic Shoppe]
description: Glossy mistwood walls rise from the plank floor.  Just above a delicate jade vase hangs a curl-edged vellum wall map, and a mistwood beam ceiling completes the picture.  Some hammered copper display hooks and a gold-leafed mistwood cabinet stand side by side in the middle of the room.
